pkgmetadata.longdescription: Optimally Robust Estimation for Extreme Value Distributions // Optimally robust estimation for extreme value distributions using S4 classes and methods (based on packages 'distr', 'distrEx', 'distrMod', 'RobAStBase', and 'ROptEst'); the underlying theoretic results can be found in Ruckdeschel and Horbenko, (2013 and 2012), \doi{10.1080/02331888.2011.628022} and \doi{10.1007/s00184-011-0366-4}.
